tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** ****** ** *** *** **** ****** * **** **** Like any normal person I searched for the best gynaecologist near me on google and she was on the top as per the reviews given online. I was a little skeptical to book an appointment initially after reading the reviews as I could not find even a single negative review for her on google. But now, after my delivery I understand why there is not a single negative comment against her. She is a commendable doctor. So down to earth and kind. My visits with her have been so soothing throughout the pregnancy. She has never let any negative thought wander around me, before and after delivery. She is till date a support system for me. She understands me very well and gives genuine advices. I had to go in emergency C-section due to the circumstances and I was extremely nervous. She was right there standing beside me calming me down during the operation prep. My operation also went smooth and I did not have any severe pain afterwards. I would highly recommend Dr. Anjali Taneja to people like me, who do a lot of research and thinking before making big decisions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Labor and Delivery,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
I met Dr. Anjali in the fifth month of pregnancy after having consulted two doctors and having been disappointed with the misinformation and their extremely rude behaviour. I was in desperate need for good guidance especially because I was only 4 months away from delivery. 

In our first meeting Dr. Anjali not only guided us about things expected for the fifth month, but also thoroughly monitored all my previous reports to make sure nothing essential is left undone. 

Throughout the process, she carefully guided me about the ideal diet, precautions and medication. 

Being a firm believer of natural methods, she always suggested home remedies first to improve my haemoglobin levels and baby's weight. 

Throughout the process she was just a call away which gave me the confidence that I was in safe and credible hands.

At the time of delivery too, we waited for circumstances to allow for normal vaginal delivery. I remained in early stage of labour for 24 hours without much progress in dilation of the cervix. Even at that stage she suggested that I wait for normal delivery but if I choose otherwise she will respect that choice which she did. 

I decided to go for a c section and she agreed immediately. 

Throughout the process of pregnancy and delivery I experienced her non judgemental attitude towards all my choices which is a rare thing to see. I found Dr. Anjali to be a thorough professional with an eye for detail and an immense ability to read through the technicalities. 

Most importantly, she was always polite and compassionate towards me like she must be with all her patients. This is especially important during pregnancy which is a very challenging time for any woman. 

Also, she always involved both me and my husband in all discussions and decisions, which was a thing missing with other doctors I visited. 

I would strongly recommend her services as a Gynaecologist and obstetrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am so thankful to have Dr. Anjali  as my gynae throughout the pregnancy and delivery process. She was able to guide us well on our every concern which kept us confident through the entire journey.She is very friendly and gave us ample amount of time to discuss our issues.She even helped me cope with my postpartum stress. I highly recommend Dr.Taneja to all the would be and new mothers who want a stressfree journey throughout their pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
After being diagnosed with multiple health issues in the past like Auto immune , fibromyalgia & with history of miscarriages , frankly, I was little scared when I conceived again. 
Practo helped me find Dr Anjali as I was looking for a qualified & highly experienced doctor nearby Vaishali. 
Dr Anjali is the most patient doctor & not only listens but find solutions to all your issues & queries. She strictly keeps tracks of all the health issues & developments , so that nothing is left unattended. I found her extremely approachable & prompt in her responses , & she personally takes care of her each & every patient . 
Reminder for  scheduled visits from her clinic makes sure that appointments are on time & are never missed . 
During last trimester of my pregnancy , I was diagnosed with IHCP & less amniotic fluid issue & had to undergo immediate surgery one month before the due date & delivered my healthy baby under Dr Anjali‚Äôs supreme guidance & care. 
I would highly recommend Dr Anjali based on my own personal experience * **** *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ******* **** *** ****** * **** **** ************
reply_text: Thanks Isha , best wishes and congratulations to family

review:
Dr Anjali was endorsed to be by my best friend who is herself a very renowned doc ‚Äì Coming from her was an obvious certification for me and thus I decided to visit her

 

I was suffering from fibrosis and after showing myself to great branded hospitals and renowned doctors ‚Äì I wasn‚Äôt convinced for the line of treatment as no one explained the ‚Äúwhys‚Äù and ‚Äúhow‚Äùs to me well.

Then Dr. Anjali happened to me ‚Äì to meet her - I travelled for 70 KM one side as I live at outskirts - on the other side of the city and each minute was worth it. 

 

In a nut shell - Dr Anjali is not just a proficient and competent doc but an amazing human with High Emotional Quotient. She understands the point of views of her patients and respects our privacy.

 

Docs like her will take India to next level of medical  transformation !

I contacted her during my first pregnancy (feb 2021) and she was with me in this journey thought out. Special shout out to her for checking up on me during odd night hours when my bp and sugar were not in check.

Also, she came on Diwali (which is a big thing) to visit me when I was admitted in the hospital due to few complications.

She is one of the best doctors and I think I will keep recommending her to all the people.

review:
Dr Anjali is a doctor par excellence. Not only is she extremely competent in her field but also wears a friendly and charming demeanor. I have been under her treatment for over a year now and have had an absolutely satisfying experience with her. She guided me well with the best possible alternatives for my problem and I was able to go ahead with a total abdominal hysterectomy successfully even in the midst of Covid 19 scare. She has always been available for me even at the oddest of hours on phone, whenever I needed her.
I will always recommend her to others.

Due to chromosome translocation issue i have gone through 3 miscarriages in 6 years of my married life although my all testing reports were Normal. We were not abled to figure out the actual reason behind of it.

With God grace Dr. Anjali Taneja found out the reason behind my miscarriages as she advised KARYOTYPE test a kind of Genetic testing.

 This is fourth time we were trying to plan a baby. This time Dr. Anjali is my gynecologist who is taking care of my pregnancy is in well manner and till date my pregnancy going smoothly.

Dr. Anjali is very Experienced Doctor by profession and by nature she is very polite, humble and gives good advise. 
Dr.Anjali address all my queries and quickly picks up my call whenever i have any questions to ask. 


All the best to new moms and be positive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: In 7th month of pregnancy our child was diagnosed with mild ventriculomegaly. The moment we came to know this we were very worried and that was the time when we met Anjali ma'am, she was very supportive,kind and patiently listened to our case and helped us through our rough time of pregnancy. In the last days of pregnancy when we were losing hope after hearing negative feedback from others  she stood with us in each and every aspects .In starting days of last month of pregnancy my wife was having minor pain and we came to see ma'am  she said for normal delivery but after a while baby's heartbeat starts to decline as baby has passed meconium  and she  immediately went for c section to save baby's life .We are really blessed and greatfull to her that she was there and due to which our little princess has come in our life . Thanks a lot ma'am for helping us mentally, emotionally we will always be greatfull and thankful to you for everything

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had shifted to Ghaziabad in my 7th month of pregnancy and was quite worried to get a good doctor who can really go through my past record and treat me well. I got to know about Dr Taneja through Google reviews and then consulted her.. My experience was extremely postive with her and can't be described in few lines but if I have to say some major qualities of Doctor then 
1. Very friendly, polite and calmly listen to every query of yours
2. Explain every problem and solutions and medications properly (Gives you time until your all query gets addressed and doubts cleared)
3. Available always on call even post consulting to clear your doubts 
4. Very well experienced as before any problem happens , she gives hints so the patient doesn't get scare once the problem happens.
5. My view on the doctor Anjali is very positive and if i have to rate my experience, then 10 on 10

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: We met Dr Anjali in the year 2016 when I was expecting for the first time and was thoroughly impressed with the way she interacted with her patients. Her calmness, soft spoken words and research for all the problems and query is highly appreciable. At no given point of time we were disappointed with her guidance and support. Best part is that she was available almost 24*7 which gives both physical and mental stability during pregnancy. Again when I expected for the second time in 2020, we consult her without giving a second thought and today I m a mother of two wonderful children. Overall I m fully satisfied with my experience and would definitely recommend anyone anytime.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
What do you look for in a Gynaecologist ? Well, I was looking for a doctor who is knowledgeable, good at diagnosis, provides treatment/medicines that suits me, explains the symptoms and treatment properly, is dependable (answers her phone even at odd hours) and approachable in case of an emergency. I consulted with a lot of doctors in quite a few hospitals before deciding to stick with Dr. Anjali as my gynaecologist. She ticked all the boxes and offered so much more as a doctor. 
I had a c-section delivery that too late at night. Dr. Anjali did a fabulous job of the surgery and I didn‚Äôt face any problems later on due to the surgery. I wholeheartedly recommend considering Dr. Anjali as your gynaecologist, but don‚Äôt just take my word for it, take a consultation with her and see for yourself.
